name: Mars Base Defender
description:
Mars Base Defender is a 3D tower defense game. 

Defend your base from waves of alien creatures! 

Place upto 4 different types of powerful turrets anywhere you deem appropriate!

Spend gold to upgrade your turrets stats and keep the aliens from destroying your base(s)!

Special thanks to:

James - https://www.youtube.com/gamesplusjames

Kenney - https://www.kenney.nl/

Quaternius - https://quaternius.com/
